TopicTitle: Can I Rename Deployed Surface Stations?

Articles.Content:
I like to name my ships something that makes sense according to what kind of mission they're running. I would like to do something similar with ground stations, maybe naming them by where they are deployed. I can't seem to figure out how to do this. I currently have several items in my tracking station called "DeployedGroundStation" or something similar and I can't seem to figure out how to rename them. Is there something I'm missing?

Thanks!
